abstract: Forget about Microsoft being a “disciplined” investor. Or Yahoo successfully defending itself. The best deal maker in the Microsoft-Yahoo saga is clearly Google.
lead_paragraph: Forget about Microsoft being a “disciplined” investor. Or Yahoo successfully defending itself. The best deal maker in the Microsoft-Yahoo saga is clearly Google.

headline.main: And the Award for Best Deal-Maker Goes to …

abstract: Unable to reach a deal with Microsoft, Yahoo turned to an alternative search advertising partnership with its rival Google, which was announced Thursday afternoon.
snippet: Unable to reach a deal with Microsoft, Yahoo turned to an alternative search advertising partnership with its rival Google, which was announced Thursday afternoon.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Talks between Yahoo and Microsoft have ended with the two companies unable to reach a deal, Yahoo said in a news release on Thursday.

headline.main: Microsoft Said to End Talks With Yahoo
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Said to End Talks With Yahoo

abstract: In a deal aimed at lifting Yahoo’s finances, Google agreed to deliver ads next to some of Yahoo’s search results.
snippet: In a deal aimed at lifting Yahoo’s finances, Google agreed to deliver ads next to some of Yahoo’s search results.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Microsoft’s four-month-long courtship of Yahoo has finally thrown Yahoo into the arms of their biggest common rival, Google.

headline.main: Ad Accord for Yahoo and Google
headline.print_headline: Ad Accord For Yahoo And Google

abstract: Google co-founder Sergey Brin has invested $5 million in Space Adventures, a Virginia outfit that books flights for the well-heeled on Russian Soyuz rockets.
snippet: Google co-founder Sergey Brin has invested $5 million in Space Adventures, a Virginia outfit that books flights for the well-heeled on Russian Soyuz rockets.
lead_paragraph: Google co-founder Sergey Brin has invested $5 million in Space Adventures, a Virginia outfit that books flights for the well-heeled on Russian Soyuz rockets.

abstract: Deal talks between Yahoo and Microsoft may really be over this time, but what about Carl C. Icahn’s proxy battle against Yahoo management?
lead_paragraph: Deal talks between Yahoo and Microsoft may really be over this time, but what about Carl C. Icahn’s proxy battle against Yahoo management?

headline.main: Yahoo Embraces Google; What Now, Mr. Icahn?

abstract: As Yahoo’s shares continued to fall Friday, an analysis of the Microsoft-Yahoo-Google situation suggests that the long saga isn’t over yet.
snippet: As Yahoo’s shares continued to fall Friday, an analysis of the Microsoft-Yahoo-Google situation suggests that the long saga isn’t over yet.
lead_paragraph: Some morning-after thoughts on the Yahoo-Google advertising deal:

headline.main: Yahoo + Google – Microsoft: The Morning After
Yahoo + Google – Microsoft: The Morning After

abstract: In the wake of Yahoo‘s decision to embrace a Google partnership in its ad search business, many have wondered what Microsoft will do next.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of Yahoo‘s decision to embrace a Google partnership in its ad search business, many have wondered what Microsoft will do next.
